name: Pokémon Yellow Legacy
storyline: The game begins in Pallet Town, Professor Oak warns you about wild Pokémon and gives you a starter Pokémon. You'll meet Oak's grandson who is also your rival and embark on a journey to defeat eight Gym Leaders, earn the Gym Badges, and enter the Indigo League. Along the way, you battle Team Rocket, a criminal organization misusing Pokémon for nefarious purposes.
summary: a Pokémon Rom Hack made by TheSmithPlays with the intended purpose of fixing Pokémon Yellow into a more polished experience while staying true to the vision of Generation 1's Yellow.
